description: ERECTION OF A PART SINGLE STOREY  PART TWO STOREY REAR EXTENSION TO PROVIDE NEW SHOWROOM  RECEPTION  OFFICE ACCOMMODATION AND REPLACEMENT GARAGE  INCLUDING PROVISION OF ADDITIONAL OFF-STREET PARKING AT THE REAR OF NO 550 KINGSTON ROAD.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The extension shall not be occupied/used until such time as the parking spaces rear of No 550 Kingston Road indicated on the deposited plan/s is/are provided and the parking spaces rear of No 550 Kingston Road shall be kept available thereafter.

Condition : 3 - Before the building/extension hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in the exten elevation of the shall be glazed with obscured glass and fixed shut and shall be maintained as such thereafter.
Condition : 4 - The flat roof area of the extension/building hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony or sitting out area.
